reviewText: I love this show and this was a great deal for the first 8 seasons.  My only complaint was the way it was all shrink-wrapped together and a couple of the season boxes were damaged.  When I contacted Amazon about it, they were happy to replace, but it would have to be the entire package, and I could easily see them arriving damaged again.  So a great deal, just be aware if you're a collector and care about condition.
summary: Great deal and great show but damaged boxes
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: I love the intelligence and mystery of the show. Yes, you can figure out who did it before the team at times due to seeing what they can't, but it's interesting to see how they get to some of the conclusions they do.
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: I have watched this show for a few years now, and I feel that the actors should be commended for their portrayal of the FBI Bau unit.Even though the show is sometimes violent.  It shows what can happen in real life.  Very well done.
summary: An excellent show that should get a high rating...........................
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: This is one of my favorite TV series.  I love the thrills and the plot twists.  Actors are excellent!  Good thing to own.
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: This is a wonderful series and would recommend it to anyone who likes crime stories the actors are fantastic and storylines the same
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: Criminal Minds is a great show I recommend it to anyone to buy the seasons together, it's much cheaper than buying them separate. They shipped fast and I got it a day after it shipped which was awesome. Yet some of the discs look scratched, I hope they all work I don't think I'll have a problem with it. Also three of the cases are damaged they almost look used. Those are the only reasons I said it was simply okay.
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack

reviewText: This is a review for the show (first 8 seasons itself).  I have only purchased season seven and eight off of Amazon, I already had the first six. The only thing about the DVD's/packaging of the individual seasons themselves is that all but two of them are in a cardboard box and are in the slim cases, this is in my opinion a cheap and crappy way of packaging expensive seasons, but not the worst way, nonetheless, it was not even consistent with two of the other seasons, 5 & 6 are in the great regular plastic cases, then it went back to the slim cases in the cardboard box.Now my review for the show:Criminal Minds is by far the greatest TV show of its kind, no crime show whether it be a Law & Order, CSI, Monk, Castle, or whatever, have been so gutsy, so investing, so brilliantly astonishing in every way! Ever since I saw one episode on TV I was hooked! But after missing an episode here and there it became hard to keep track so I tried to rent them (never do this) and one disk was missing so I went a few years not watching the show, then my mother and I started buying the seasons to get through the winter, we started them long before winter and finished them before too! This show was so engaging, I love the characters, the plots, murders, murders or whatever crimes they have, I have never been so invested in such a show, I wish season 9 would be released already!!!!! I HIGHLY recommend this show, my favorite character is Dr. Spencer Reid. I have yet to see a bad season and hope it ends before that happens. Truly an amazing masterpiece of a show!Criminal Minds: Season 1 - 8 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 1 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 2 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 3 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 4 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 5 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 6 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 7 ***** out of *****Criminal Minds: Season 8 ***** out of *****Violent Content: 6/10 - Strong Violence, Infrequent Graphic Gory Imagery, Some Bloody Violence.Sexulity/Nudity: 3/10 - Some Strong Dialog and Descriptions of Sexual Activities Including Rape.
Title: Criminal Minds: Eight Season Pack
